trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Lansdale
There were no other sightings in Lansdale on or around November 17th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsThe main color of the objects was red with small orange orbs attached to the base. The primary red structure was similar to the shape of a parachute or umbrella. They were totally silent and moved slowly at the same speed the entire sighting.The colors were vivid and bright making them stand out against the sky as the sun was setting.I was able to observe the objects for approximately 12 minutes before they were no longer visible.
Summary: I walked to the edge of my covered patio and was taken by surprise by two objects moving silently toward the south.
